name: Shadows are Real
description:
A simple platformer made for the brackeys 2022.1 game jam. 

The theme was IT IS NOT REAL so I've decided to make a platformer where things that don't have a shadow aren't real.

I hope you'll enjoy this short expirience, good luck!

The controls are:

A and D / arrows to move left and right

Space/W/up arrow to jump

Escape to pause and unpause

R to restart the level
